Package io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs

Class TextStyle

java.lang.Object
io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs.TextStyle
public final class TextStyle extends Object
The definition for styling recommendations blocks of text. Most common usage is to style columns in a table, but may also be used to specify default styling for a DocAppendable. HelpWriters are free to ignore the TextStyle recommendations particularly where they are not supported or contradict common usage.
Since:
1.10.0

    • pad

      public CharSequence pad(boolean addIndent, CharSequence text)
      Pads a string to the maximum width or optionally to the maximum width - indent.
      • Returns the string unchanged if it is longer than the specified length.
      • Will add the padding based on the alignment.
      Parameters:
      addIndent - if true account for the indent when padding the string.
      text - the text to pad.
      Returns:
      the padded string.
